Title: Transfer money instantly
description: Easily send money to any registered user through their phone number or account ID. Instant and secure transactions guaranteed.

Title: Deposit funds to your account
description: Deposit money into your account using any authorized agent or bank transfer. Available for all users with minimal transaction fees.

Title: Withdraw money from your account
description: Withdraw funds from your account via authorized agents or direct bank transfers. Enjoy quick and secure cash outs anytime.

Title: Create an account
description: Sign up for an account and enjoy seamless transactions. Get access to features like Send Money, Cash In, Cash Out, and more.

Title: Become an authorized agent
description: Join our network as an agent and provide cash in and cash out services. Enjoy competitive commission rates and business opportunities.

Title: View your past transactions
description: Keep track of your past transactions including money transfers, cash ins, and cash outs. Detailed history available in your account.
